title: Your account has been transferred to another region.
body:
My main account is in the EUW region. When I look it up, it is still there. However, when I go to log in, I am told that I am I attempting to log into an account from a different region and I must choose the appropriate region. Now this is where it gets better. tried doing as told, and I seem to be on none of the other regions.
I don't know what to do. My Summoner name is EinTim, and you can see me on the EUW server.
I am in a state of panic because I can also no longer log into my account on this website.
Please help me in any way. I have tried all the possible things me and a friend can think of.
And yes, I have sent a ticket to the riot support. But that will take a long time to receive a response to.
But the thing is, that I also don't have access to the support ticket.
So I'd like to ask if there is another chance to settle things. (e.g. via E-Mail)
Thank you for you time

replies.body:
It shouldn't take too long until a recovery specialist reaches back out on your ticket. All of your interactions with the recovery specialist will be done via email from your end, so keep an eye out for that reply.

If you have any questions, let me know.
